attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, insist upon:

English only votes in Westminster, and MPs of  constituencies outside England not to vote, on English matters that would fall within devolved powers if related to any other country within the UK.
Revision of the Barnett Formula.
No taxation without equal representation.

rejection.details:
Please see petition below:

Petition Title: Exclusion of non-English MPs from English affairs

Created by: John Craib

Closing: 30/03/2015
